p: To Dr. D.D. Penfield In the name of the United States you are hereby required to appear before the undersigned, one of the Justices of the Peace in and for the said County, on the 28th day of June 1886, at 2 o'clock P.M. at his office in Spokane Falls W.T. to give evidence in a certain cause then and there to be tried between the Territory of Washington Plaintiff and Ray Raymond Defendant
On the part of the Defendant to bring with for response in evidence after this paper payable
Spokane Falls, Wash Ter concerning of April 26, 1886
Given under my hand this 28th day of June 1886
J.J.L. Peel Justice of the Peace
